info.name: Modern Mediasite
info.description: A skin for Sonicfoundry Mediasite. Some intern did their styling 10 years ago and it's screaming for a refresh, which this style aims to provide, at least to some degree.
info.additionalInfo: Currently works on: - TU Delft Collegerama - Leiden University Lecturenet GitHub repo because the UserStyles UX sucks Todo's: - allowing customization - adding more Mediasites to the list of domains
